artist: Engraver: Pierre Guillame Alexandre Beljambe; Painter: Giovanni Bellini
description: Christ child at center being held by the virgin; woman at her side; high priest and two men across the altar from her
inscription:
Signature, Title and Inscription

in plate in black: [ JOHANNES BELLINUS/ Peint par Jean Bellin   Grave par P. Beljambe, des Acad.ies R. les de Caen er d\'Orléans/ LA CIRCONSISION./ A.P. (shield) D.R.]; on sheet in pencil: [1-107]
title: La Circonsision
